001
002/**
003 * Classe GameWorld - Créer le monde du jeu
004 * 
005 * Création des pièces, items, trapdoor, lockdoor
006 *
007 * @author CLEMENT RUAN
008 * @version 2026
009 */
010public class GameWorld
011{
012    /**
013     * Constructeur privé pour empêcher l'instanciation
014     */
015    private GameWorld(){}
016    
017    /**
018     * Construit le monde du jeu
019     * Retourne la pièce de départ
020     * 
021     * @return La pièce de départ
022     */
023    public static Room createWorld()
024    {
025        // Création des îles du jeu
026        Room vPortusPrima = new Room("at Portus Prima island", "images/island/1-portus-prima.png");
027        Room vInsulaTemplum  = new Room("at Insula Templum island", "images/island/2-insula-templum.png");
028        Room vCryptaMarina = new Room("at Crypta Marina island", "images/island/3-cripta-marina.png");
029        Room vCivitasAntiqua = new Room("at Civitas Antiqua island", "images/island/4-civitas-antiqua.png");
030        Room vSilvaMystica = new Room("in the Silva Mystica island", "images/island/5-silva-mystica.png");
031        Room vMercatusFlotilla = new Room("at Mercatus Flotilla island", "images/island/6-mercatus-flotilla.png");
032        Room vLabyrinthos = new Room("in the Labyrinthos island", "images/island/7-labyrinthos.png");
033        Room vMonsCaelestis = new Room("at Mons Caelestis montain", "images/island/9-mons-caelestis.png");
034        Room vUltimaSapientia = new Room("in the Ultima Sapientia temple", "images/island/10-ultima-sapientia.png");
035
036        // Création des lieux principaux du jeu
037        // 1 - Portus Prima
038        Room vLibrary1 = createLibrary();
039        Room vTavern1 = createTavern();
040        Room vHostel1 = createHostel();
041        Room vSanctuaryOfTheOracle1 = createSanctuaryOfTheOracle();
042        Room vSeaPort1 = createSeaPort();
043        // 2 - Insula Templum
044        Room[] vAncientTempleRooms = createAncientTemple();
045        Room vTempleEntrance = vAncientTempleRooms[0];
046        Room vTreasuryAncientTemple = vAncientTempleRooms[1];
047        Room vSeaPort2 = createSeaPort();
048        // 3 - Crypta Marina
049        Room vSeaPort3 = createSeaPort();
050        Room vSanctuaryOfTheOracle3 = createSanctuaryOfTheOracle();
051        Room vTavern3 = createTavern();
052        // 4 - Civitas Antiqua
053        Room vSeaPort4 = createSeaPort();
054        Room vRuinedPalaceRooms[] = createRuinedPalace();
055        Room vPalaceEntrance = vRuinedPalaceRooms[0];
056        Room vTreasuryRuinedPalace = vRuinedPalaceRooms[1];
057        // 5 - Silva Mystica
058        Room vSeaPort5 = createSeaPort();
059        Room vSanctuaryOfTheOracle5 = createSanctuaryOfTheOracle();
060        Room vTavern5 = createTavern();
061        // 6 - Mercatus Flotilla
062        Room vSeaPort6 = createSeaPort();
063        Room vHostel6 = createHostel();
064        Room vTavern6 = createTavern();
065        Room vLibrary6 = createLibrary();
066        // 7 - Labyrinthos
067        Room vSeaPort7 = createSeaPort();
068        Room vTavern7 = createTavern();
069        Room[] vCaveRooms = createCave();
070        Room vCave = vCaveRooms[0];
071        Room vNarrowPassage = vCaveRooms[1];
072        Room vLostHole = new Room("in the lost hole, you can't go up !", "");
073        // 8 - Sanctum Ignis
074        Room[] vUndergroundTempleRooms = createUndergroundTemple();
075        Room vUndergroundTemple = vUndergroundTempleRooms[0];
076        Room vTreasureVaultUndergroundTemple = vUndergroundTempleRooms[1];
077        // 9 - Mons Caelestis
078        Room vSeaPort9 = createSeaPort();
079        Room[] vAncientObservatoryRooms = createAncientObservatory();
080        Room vAncientObservatory = vAncientObservatoryRooms[0];
081        Room vTelescopeRoom = vAncientObservatoryRooms[1];
082        Room[] vSacredMontainRooms = createSacredMontain();
083        Room vMontainBase = vSacredMontainRooms[0];
084        Room vWaterfall = vSacredMontainRooms[1];
085        // 10 - Ultima Sapientia
086        Room vSapientiaTemple = createSapientiaTemple();
087
088
089
090        
091        Room vGuideStone2 = new Room("at the guide stone of Insula Templum", "images/island/2-insula-templum.png");
092        Room vGuideStone2Solved = new Room("in the exit of the guide stone", "images/island/2-insula-templum.png");
093
094        // Les énigmes de la stèle 2
095        // Énigme 1
096        Room vGuide2Enigme1 = new Room("Enigma 1", "images/guide_stone/guide2/enigme1.png");
097        Room vGuide2Enigme1Answer1 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");
098        Room vGuide2Enigme1Answer2 = new Room("Correct! The stone glows with approval.", "images/guide_stone/correct.jpg");
099        Room vGuide2Enigme1Answer3 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");

110        Room vGuide2Enigme3Answer1 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");
111        Room vGuide2Enigme3Answer2 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");

113        Room vGuide2Enigme3Answer4 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");

117        Room vGuide2Enigme4Answer1 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");
118        Room vGuide2Enigme4Answer2 = new Room("Wrong answer! The stone rejects you.", "images/guide_stone/wrong.jpg");

120        Room vGuide2Enigme4Answer4 = new Room("Correct! The stone glows with approval.", "images/guide_stone/correct.jpg");

137        vGuide2Enigme2Answer1.setExit("enigma2", vGuide2Enigme2);
138        vGuide2Enigme2Answer2.setExit("enigma2", vGuide2Enigme2);
139        vGuide2Enigme2Answer4.setExit("enigma2", vGuide2Enigme2);
140        vGuide2Enigme2Answer3.setExit("enigma3", vGuide2Enigme3);

146        vGuide2Enigme3Answer1.setExit("enigma3", vGuide2Enigme3);
147        vGuide2Enigme3Answer2.setExit("enigma3", vGuide2Enigme3);
148        vGuide2Enigme3Answer4.setExit("enigma3", vGuide2Enigme3);
149        vGuide2Enigme3Answer3.setExit("enigma4", vGuide2Enigme4);

157        vGuide2Enigme4Answer3.setExit("enigma4", vGuide2Enigme4);
158        vGuide2Enigme4Answer4.setExit("exit", vGuideStone2Solved);
159        // L'item récompense de la stèle

161                                    "A map of Crypta Marina island", 0.2, 50);

718        vSilvaMystica.setExit("sanctuary", vSanctuaryOfTheOracle5);
719        vSilvaMystica.setExit("tavern", vTavern5);
720        vSilvaMystica.setExit("guidestone", vFakeGuideStone5);
721        vSilvaMystica.setExit("seaport", vSeaPort5);
722
723        // 6 - Mercatus Flotilla
724
725        vMercatusFlotilla.setExit("boat", vBoat);
726        vMercatusFlotilla.setExit("seaport", vSeaPort6);
727        vMercatusFlotilla.setExit("hostel", vHostel6);
728        vMercatusFlotilla.setExit("tavern", vTavern6);
729        vMercatusFlotilla.setExit("library", vLibrary6);
730
731        // 7 - Labyrinthos
732
733        vLabyrinthos.setExit("boat", vBoat);
734        vLabyrinthos.setExit("seaport", vSeaPort7);
735        vLabyrinthos.setExit("tavern", vTavern7);
736        vLabyrinthos.setExit("cave", vCave);
737
738        // Liaison grotte -> trou perdu -> temple souterrain
739        vNarrowPassage.setExit("down", vLostHole);
740
741        // 8 - Sanctum Ignis
742
743        vLostHole.setExit("underground_temple", vUndergroundTemple);
744        vTreasureVaultUndergroundTemple.setExit("guidestone", vGuideStone8);
745        vGuideStone8.setExit("treasure_vault", vTreasureVaultUndergroundTemple);
746        vGuideStone8Solved.setExit("labyrinthos", vLabyrinthos);
747
748
749        // 9 - Mons Caelestis
750
751        vMonsCaelestis.setExit("boat", vBoat);
752        vMonsCaelestis.setExit("seaport", vSeaPort9);
753        vMonsCaelestis.setExit("montain_base", vMontainBase);
754        vMontainBase.setExit("mons_caelestis", vMonsCaelestis);
755        vWaterfall.setExit("observatory", vAncientObservatory);
756        vAncientObservatory.setExit("waterfall", vWaterfall);
757        vTelescopeRoom.setExit("guidestone", vGuideStone9);
758        vGuideStone9.setExit("telescope", vTelescopeRoom);
759        vGuideStone9Solved.setExit("telescope", vTelescopeRoom);
760
761        // 10 - Ultima Sapientia
762
763        vUltimaSapientia.setExit("boat", vBoat);
764        vUltimaSapientia.setExit("sapientia_temple", vSapientiaTemple);
765        
766        // Pièce de départ
767        return vBoat;
768    } // CreateWorld()

1363     * @return Un tableau contenant l'entrée [0] et le passage étroit [1]
1364     */
1365    public static Room[] createCave()
1366    {

1372        Room vDarkTunnel = new Room("in a dark tunnel", "images/grotte.jpg");
1373
1374        // Le placement des pièces
1375        vCaveEntrance.setExit("cavern", vMainCavern);
1376        
1377        vMainCavern.setExit("entrance", vCaveEntrance);
1378        vMainCavern.setExit("lake", vUndergroundLake);
1379        vMainCavern.setExit("passage", vNarrowPassage);
1380            
1381        vUndergroundLake.setExit("cavern", vMainCavern);
1382        vUndergroundLake.setExit("tunnel", vDarkTunnel);
1383        
1384        vNarrowPassage.setExit("cavern", vMainCavern);
1385        
1386        vDarkTunnel.setExit("lake", vUndergroundLake);
1387

1390        Item vLantern = new Item("lantern", "Oil lantern", 2, 30);
1391        Item vMap = new Item("treasure_map", "Old treasure map", 0.2, 80);
1392        Item vPickaxe = new Item("pickaxe", "Mining pickaxe", 3, 40);
1393        Item vRope = new Item("rope", "Strong climbing rope", 2, 25);
1394        Item vWaterBottle = new Item("water_bottle", "Fresh underground water", 0.5, 10);
1395        Item vFossil = new Item("fossil", "Ancient fossil", 1, 120);
1396

1400

1687        // Pièce de départ + waterfall pour connexions externes
1688        return new Room[]{vMontainBase, vWaterfall};
1689    } // createSacredMontain()
1690
1691    /**
1692     * Crée le temple de la sagesse ultime (Ultima Sapientia)
1693     * C'est la dernière île du jeu où le joueur découvre la vérité
1694     * 
1695     * @return La pièce d'entrée du temple Sapientia
1696     */
1697    public static Room createSapientiaTemple()
1698    {
1699        // Les pièces du temple Sapientia
1700        Room vTempleGate = new Room("at the gate of Ultima Sapientia temple", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1701        Room vMainHall = new Room("in the grand hall of wisdom", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1702        Room vHallOfTruth = new Room("in the hall of truth", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1703        Room vHallOfKnowledge = new Room("in the hall of knowledge", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1704        Room vSacredLibrary = new Room("in the sacred library of ancients", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1705        Room vChamberOfSecrets = new Room("in the chamber of secrets", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1706        Room vInnerSanctum = new Room("in the inner sanctum", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1707        Room vTreasureVault = new Room("in the vault of eternal treasures", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1708        Room vEnd = new Room("You have discovered the truth! YOU WIN!", "images/sapientia-temple.jpg");
1709
1710        // Le placement des pièces
1711        vTempleGate.setExit("hall", vMainHall);
1712        
1713        vMainHall.setExit("gate", vTempleGate);
1714        vMainHall.setExit("truth", vHallOfTruth);
1715        vMainHall.setExit("knowledge", vHallOfKnowledge);
1716        vMainHall.setExit("library", vSacredLibrary);
1717        vMainHall.setExit("inner", vInnerSanctum);
1718        
1719        vHallOfTruth.setExit("hall", vMainHall);
1720        
1721        vHallOfKnowledge.setExit("hall", vMainHall);
1722        vHallOfKnowledge.setExit("chamber", vChamberOfSecrets);
1723        
1724        vSacredLibrary.setExit("hall", vMainHall);
1725        vSacredLibrary.setExit("vault", vTreasureVault);
1726        
1727        vChamberOfSecrets.setExit("knowledge", vHallOfKnowledge);
1728        
1729        vInnerSanctum.setExit("hall", vMainHall);
1730        vInnerSanctum.setExit("end", vEnd);
1731        
1732        vTreasureVault.setExit("library", vSacredLibrary);
1733        
1734        vEnd.setExit("nowhere", vEnd);
1735
1736        // Créer les items
1737        Item vTorch = new Item("eternal_torch", "Torch that burns eternally", 1, 100);
1738        Item vStatue = new Item("wisdom_statue", "Majestic statue of the goddess of wisdom", 150, 5000);
1739        Item vCandle = new Item("sacred_candle", "Sacred candle of enlightenment", 0.3, 50);
1740        Item vIncense = new Item("mystic_incense", "Incense of clarity", 0.2, 80);
1741        Item vAncientScroll1 = new Item("scroll_of_creation", "Scroll describing the creation of this world", 0.4, 1000);
1742        Item vAncientScroll2 = new Item("scroll_of_destiny", "Scroll of ancient destinies", 0.4, 1200);
1743        Item vAncientScroll3 = new Item("scroll_of_time", "Scroll revealing the secrets of time", 0.4, 1500);
1744        Item vSecret = new Item("the_truth", "The ultimate truth about this world", 0.1, 0);
1745        Item vVaultKey = new Item("vault_key", "Key to the treasure vault", 0.1, 500);
1746        Item vChamberKey = new Item("chamber_key", "Key to the chamber of secrets", 0.1, 800);
1747
1748        // Ajouter les items aux pièces
1749        vTempleGate.setItem(vTorch);
1750        vTempleGate.setItem(vCandle);
1751        
1752        vMainHall.setItem(vStatue);
1753        vMainHall.setItem(vIncense);
1754        vMainHall.setItem(vTorch);
1755        
1756        vHallOfTruth.setItem(vAncientScroll1);
1757        
1758        vHallOfKnowledge.setItem(vChamberKey);
1759        
1760        vSacredLibrary.setItem(vAncientScroll2);
1761        vSacredLibrary.setItem(vAncientScroll3);
1762        vSacredLibrary.setItem(vVaultKey);
1763        
1764        vChamberOfSecrets.setItem(vSecret);
1765        
1766        vInnerSanctum.setItem(vStatue);
1767
1768        // Les portes verrouillées
1769        
1770        Door vDoorChamber = new Door(vChamberKey, false);
1771        vHallOfKnowledge.setDoor("chamber", vDoorChamber);
1772        vChamberOfSecrets.setDoor("knowledge", vDoorChamber);
1773        
1774        // La porte finale - nécessite l'item "vSecret" pour gagner
1775        Door vDoorEnd = new Door(vSecret, false);
1776        vInnerSanctum.setDoor("end", vDoorEnd);
1777        vEnd.setDoor("nowhere", vDoorEnd);
1778
1779        // Pièce de départ
1780        return vTempleGate;
1781    } // createSapientiaTemple()
1782
1783
1784} // GameWorld.java
